name: Sport Sport Go!
description:
Sport Sport Go! offers a small selection of mini-games to choose from. Play against your friends with our Boxing and Climbing local competitive modes or try to reach a high score in our rythm based Musical Canine Freestyle mini-game! More mini-games, modes and updates to come! 

Controls

 ---------------------- 

Boxing

 --------

Player 1: Press D to punch. 

Player 2: Press J to punch.

 ----------- 

Rope Climbing: 

Player 1: Alternate between pressing A and D to climb. 

Player 2: Alternate between pressing J and L to climb.

 ---------- 

Musical Canine Freestyle

 --------------------------------------- 

Press A, S or D at the correct time to match the rythm of the song and earn points!

 ---------------------------------------------------------------- 

Credits: Sport Sport Go! is the first ever project by Ratonera. This was the work of a single developer who challanged himself to make a functional video-game in under 1 week (and failed, since I did take a little more than a week). 

Audio Assets:

Fantasy Menu SFX by Chris M Audio

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom

Upbeat Pop Day by Asepirawan20 from Pixabay 

Various Genres Music Collection Free by marching dream
